reg:regulation.reg:title: Training Tax Credits (Prescribed Requirements and Date) Regulation
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 272/2012, October 1, 2012]

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Other prescribed requirements tax credits for individuals
bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of sections 118 (1) (d), 119 (1) (d) and 119.1 (1) (d) of the Income Tax Act, the prescribed requirement is that, while the individual was registered in an eligible recognized program or eligible training program, the individual was not

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: enrolled under section 3 of the School Act,
registered under section 13 of the School Act, or
attending an independent school, as defined in the Independent School Act, or an educational institution operated by the government of Canada or by a band, as defined in the Indian Act (Canada).

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote:
Prescribed date tax credits for shipbuilding
and ship repair industry employers
bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of the definition of "applicable period" in section 126.1 of the Income Tax Act, the prescribed date is October 1, 2012.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Income Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 215, section 131]
